# batteryState

**Instance Property**

The battery state for the device.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var batteryState: UIDevice.BatteryState { get }
```

## Discussion

The value for [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDevice/batteryState-swift.property] is one of the constants in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDevice/BatteryState-swift.enum].

If battery monitoring is not enabled, the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDevice/BatteryState-swift.enum/unknown].

## Getting the device battery state

- **batteryLevel**: The battery charge level for the device.
- **isBatteryMonitoringEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether battery monitoring is enabled.
- **UIDevice.BatteryState**: Constants that describe the battery power state of the device.
